item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES A-WING EXPANSION PACK Fastest ship in the rebel arsenal. So far, my favorite ship to fly in the game. Quantity: 2

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – B-Wing Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES B-WING EXPANSION PACK My favorite ship from the Star Wars movies. It flys like a bear, but it's armed to the teeth! Quantity: 2

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – HWK-290 Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES HWK-290 EXPANSION PACK I am not familiar with this ship from the expanded universe, so only time will tell how good it is. Looks cool though!

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Lambda-class Shuttle Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS X-WING MINIATURES LAMBDA-CLASS SHUTTLE PACK Beautiful mini that's great for scenario play.

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Millennium Falcon Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES MILLENIUM FALCON EXPANSION PACK "She'll hold together. Ya hear me baby? Hold together."

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – TIE Advanced Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS X-WING MINIATURES TIE ADVANCED EXPANSION PACK Now entering the battlefield...Darth Vader!

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – TIE Bomber Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS X-WING MINIATURES TIE BOMBER EXPANSION PACK I was really surprised what a power house this ship is! I mean you only see it in one scene bombing an asteroid in "The Empire Strikes Back". All in all a good addition to the Imperial fleet.

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – TIE Fighter Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES TIE FIGHTER EXPANSION PACK Work horse of the empire.

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – TIE Interceptor Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES TIE INTERCEPTOR EXPANSION PACK Cool, sleek, and deadly. Quantity: 2

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – X-Wing Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES X-WING EXPANSION PACK Plaid 5 standing by... Quantity: 2

item.name: Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game – Y-Wing Expansion Pack
item.comment: STAR WARS: X-WING MINIATURES Y-WING EXPANSION PACK Ion cannon is cool. (so long as you're not being shot by it!) Quantity: 2

item.name: StarCraft: The Board Game
item.comment: STARCRAFT: THE BOARDGAME Not a bad game. The stands that the ships are on break easily.

item.name: Starship Catan
item.comment: STARSHIP CATAN I enjoy this 2 player variation of 'The Starfarers of Catan'.

item.name: Start Player
item.comment: START PLAYER It's really just easier to roll a D20, but if you have to get fancy see 'Geek Dice'.

item.name: Stock Exchange
item.comment: MONOPOLY STOCK EXCHANGE ADD-ON I'll never play 'Monopoly' again without this add-on. It makes the game a bit more interesting. The stocks are all interesting and have the same art deco style as the original game.

item.name: Stone Age
item.comment: STONE AGE I always think of the movie "Caveman" when playing this. "Atook zug-zug Lana!"

item.name: Stone Age: The Expansion
item.comment: STONE AGE: STYLE IS THE GOAL Seems to slow down what used to be a quick game.

item.name: The Struggle for Catan
item.comment: THE STRUGGLE FOR CATAN Fun card game, but can be very cutthroat at times.

item.name: Suburbia
item.comment: SUBURBIA Reminds me of the old computer game SimCity. Artwork could be better. I'd rather play 'Castles of Mad King Ludwig'.

item.name: Summoner Wars: Master Set
item.comment: SUMMONER WARS: MASTER SET A card game on a checker board.

item.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis!
item.comment: SURVIVE: ESCAPE FROM ATLANTIS I enjoyed this as a kid, and was glad to see a reprint. The bits are fantatsic!

item.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis! 5-6 Player Mini Expansion
item.comment: SURVIVE: ESCAPE FROM ATLANTIS 5-6 PLAYER MINI EXPANSION Now 2 more players can "feed" the sharks!

item.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis! Dolphins & Dive Dice Mini Extension
item.comment: SURVIVE: ESCAE FROM ATLANTIS! DOLPHINS & DIVE DICE The dolphins are ok, but the dice dice are great. They make the critters even faster and therefore more lethal.

item.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis! The Giant Squid Mini Expansion
item.comment: SURVIVE: THE GIANT SQUID The giant squid is probably the most lethal critter in 'Survive', it can pluck folks right off the island! This really makes the game more fun!

item.name: Sushi Go!
item.comment: SUSHI GO Lite filler featuring drafting and set collection. Fun for the short time it takes.

item.name: T.I.M.E Stories
item.comment: T.I.M.E STORIES GREAT ARTWORK AND ORIGINAL MECHANISMS ADD UP TO AN IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAYING EXPERIENCE. LOTS OF FUN!

item.name: Taj Mahal
item.comment: TAJ MAHAL Sorry too abstract for me.

item.name: Takenoko
item.comment: TAKENOKO Yawn.

item.name: Tales & Games: The Hare & the Tortoise
item.comment: TALES & GAMES: THE HARE & THE TORTOISE What looks like a kids game masks a truly clever game that is fun to end a long night of gaming with.

item.name: Tales of the Arabian Nights
item.comment: TALES OF THE ARABIAN NIGHTS Fun game that plays like a "Choose Your Own Adventure" book. Very unique!

item.name: Talisman
item.comment: TALISMAN I keep this around just for old times sake.

item.name: Talisman City
item.comment: TALISMAN CITY To obey the laws in the city...SUCKS! To break the laws in the city...SUCKS! 'nuff said.

item.name: Talisman Dragons
item.comment: TALISMAN: DRAGONS Eh, a few more player characters.

item.name: The Talisman Dungeon
item.comment: TALISMAN DUNGEON Good expansion. With an additional way to reach the Crown of Command, it helps shorten the game a little bit.

item.name: Talisman Expansion Set
item.comment: TALISMAN EXPANSION SET More of everything from the base set. The additional characters were desperately needed.

item.name: Talisman Timescape
item.comment: TALISMAN: TIMESCAPE Warhammer Characters and the exit from the Horrible Black Void!

item.name: Talisman: The Adventure
item.comment: TALISMAN: THE ADVENTURE The best thing about this expansion is the alternate ending cards. Now the first person to the crown of command isn't necessarily the winner!

item.name: Telestrations
item.comment: TELESTRATIONS Fun party game, and utterly hilarious!

item.name: Terra Mystica
item.comment: TERRA MYSTICA A lot to learn at first, but after one play you get it.

item.name: Terror in Meeple City
item.comment: RAMPAGE Fun and attractive monster flicking game.

item.name: Thebes
item.comment: THEBES Great theme, easy to play, and lots of fun!

item.name: They've Invaded Pleasantville
item.comment: THEY'VE INVADED PLEASANTVILLE This was a study hall staple when I was in high school.

item.name: The Three Pillars: A Paranormal Card Game
item.comment: THE THREE PILLARS Good cardplay but I'm really not crazy about the theme.

item.name: Thunderstone
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE Not bad, but I really prefer 'Thunderstone Advance'.

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Caverns of Bane
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE: CAVERNS OF BANE More cards for 'Thunderstone Advance'. Introduces treasure cards.
item.haspartslist: Old Style Ambusher Cards: 2 Darkling 2 Dusk Hunter 3 Mancatcher Worm 2 Rot Grub 2 Troll Skullcracker

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Into the Abyss
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE: INTO THE ABYSS I like the old 'Thunderstone' reprints! Other highlights: New uses for experience tokens, and level 4 heroes!

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Numenera
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE: NUMENERA This set was better than I expected, and would easily combine with past 'Thunderstone Advnce' sets even if you don't use the settings mechanism. I would get this if I could find the room on my game shelf.

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Root of Corruption
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE: ROOT OF CORRUPTION Despite the poorly folded poster (why no board?) for co-op play, the cards are all top notch.

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Towers of Ruin
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE: TOWERS OF RUIN A great place to jump on the 'Thunderstone' bandwagon! Revamped cards, a gorgeous board, and even cool "thunderstone shard" experience tokens make this a must buy!
item.haspartslist: Old Style Ambusher Cards: 3 Drakeclan Ambusher 2 Plunderwing 2 Slaughterwing

item.name: Thunderstone Advance: Worlds Collide
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE ADVANCE: WORLDS COLLIDE I think it's great that all the old 'Thunderstone' cards are being updated for 'Thunderstone Advance'!

item.name: Thunderstone Avatars
item.comment: THUNDERSTONE AVATARS Not necessary but still fun.

item.name: Tichu
item.comment: TICHU Some folks play it like championship chess instead of like the piece of crap that it is. I refer to it as "Toilet Tichu".

item.name: Ticket to Ride
item.comment: TICKET TO RIDE I love this game! I only wish the train stations from 'Ticket to Ride: Europe' were included (or at least available as a mini expansion).

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Europe
item.comment: TICKET TO RIDE: EUROPE The train stations are a nice idea.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Switzerland
item.comment: TICKET TO RIDE: SWITZERLAND Good overall, but can be tricky if unfamiliar with Europian cities and/or locations.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: USA 1910
item.comment: TICKET TO RIDE: USA 1910 The replacement deck of full size cards and new routes and variants make this a great expansion!

item.name: Tides of Infamy
item.comment: TIDES OF INFANY I really wanted to like this game as the bits and cards are attractive, however, the rules are a mess making it very frustrating to play.

item.name: Tides of Time
item.comment: TIDES OF TIME Good filler for two.

item.name: Tikal
item.comment: TIKAL What once seemed like lots of fun has turned into another Eurogame bore.

item.name: Tiki Topple
item.comment: TIKI TOPPLE Almost identical to GMT's 'Formula Motor Racing' except in theme and the scoring of points. Light and fun.

item.name: Time's Up! Title Recall!
item.comment: TIMES UP! TITLE RECALL A little fun, but not as good as some people lead me to believe. I'd rather play 'Catch Phrase'.

item.name: Tiny Epic Galaxies
item.comment: TINY EPIC GALAXIES Fun filler with great bits.

item.name: To Court the King
item.comment: TO COURT THE KING The next time someone says they want to play Yahtzee, teach them this fun little game that is so much better!

item.name: Tokaido
item.comment: TOKAIDO Attractive looking, but is in such need of player aids it's ridiculous!

item.name: Torres
item.comment: TORRES Fair

item.name: A Touch of Evil: Hero Pack 1
item.comment: A TOUCH OF EVIL: HERO PACK 1 I would rate this expansion higher if not for the warped character boards.

item.name: A Touch of Evil: Something Wicked Expansion
item.comment: A TOUCH OF EVIL: SOMETHING WICKED I like the photographic art style, but this game is way too light for me.

item.name: A Touch of Evil: The Supernatural Game
item.comment: A TOUCH OF EVIL I like the photographic art style, but this game is just way too light for me.

item.name: Tower
item.comment: TOWER Not a bad filler, not a particularly good one either.

item.name: Trains: Rising Sun
item.comment: TRAINS: RISING SUN I wasn't too thrilled with the theme when I first sat down to play this, but by the end of the game I had to admit it was a lot of fun. Easy to learn too.

item.name: TransAmerica
item.comment: TRANSAMERICA Good, fun, filler To increase the difficulty (and the challenge) add the Vexation expansion.

item.name: Triassic Terror
item.comment: TRIASSIC TERROR I'd rather play 'Evo' first edition for my dinodaur fix.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: Baby Boomer Edition
item.comment: TRIVIAL PURSUIT: BABY BOOMER EDITION Nothing special.
item.conditiontext: Some fading and box wear, but all cards are in new condition.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: Genus II
item.comment: TRIVIAL PURSUIT: GENUS II Good follow up to the original.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: Master Game – Genus Edition
item.comment: TRIVIAL PURSUIT I'm a trivia hound and have always liked this game. It doesn't get many plays anymore because there's so much else to play.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: Silver Screen Edition
item.comment: TRIVIAL PURSUIT: SILVER SCREEN EDITION Ridiculous questions.
item.conditiontext: Slight box wear, but all cards are in new condition.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: The 1980's
item.comment: TRIVIAL PURSUIT: THE 1980'S One of the last cards-only sets released.

item.name: Trivial Pursuit: TV
item.comment: TRIVIAL PURSUIT: TV By far, my favorite set to use.

item.name: Troyes
item.comment: TROYES I like the dice and that's it.

item.name: Tsuro
item.comment: TSURO A quick light filler about dragons flying around trying not to crash into each other. Beautiful artwork and bits.

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition)
item.comment: TWILIGHT IMPERIUM One big long mo-fo of a game!!! Yeesh! It took a while to learn, but it was worth it!! Always play with the expansions. Truly, truly epic!

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition): Shards of the Throne
item.comment: TWILIGHT IMPERIUM: SHARDS OF THE THRONE Fantastic expansion for a fantastic game!! One word- Flagships!

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition): Shattered Empire
item.comment: TWILIGHT IMPERIUM: SHATTERED EMPIRE The new stategy cards improve TI3. Use the artifacts too!

item.name: Ugg-Tect
item.comment: UGG-TECT Fun party game in which you are a stone age architect trying to get your "workers" to build stuff. Inflatable clubs are included since nothing gets the job done like a smack in the head!

item.name: Ultimate Werewolf Artifacts
item.comment: ULTIMATE WEREWOLF ARTIFACTS Now even if you're just a lousy villager the artifacts will give you something fun to do!

item.name: Ultimate Werewolf: Ultimate Edition
item.comment: ULTIMATE WEREWOLF The best version of 'Werewolf' you can buy.

item.name: Undermining
item.comment: UNDERMINING Simple game, fantastic bits. I love the little plastic UMVs (Universal Mining Vehicles)!

item.name: Vexation
item.comment: VEXATION Adds a nice "FU" factor to 'Transamerica'.

item.name: The Voyages of Marco Polo
item.comment: THE VOYAGES OF MARCO POLO Fun strategy game that has alot to it but is easy to understand. You must avoid concentrating on only connecting your trade routes or your opponets will leave you in the dust.

item.name: Wallenstein (first edition)
item.comment: WALLENSTEIN Bad first play experience has soured me on this game.

item.name: War of the Ring (first edition)
item.comment: WAR OF THE RING Best "Lord of the Rings" game hands down.

item.name: War of the Ring: Battles of the Third Age
item.comment: WAR OF THE RING: BATTLES OF THE THIRD AGE Great expansion that let's you reenact the battles of Horn's Deep and Pelennor Fields.

item.name: War of the Ring: Lords of Middle-earth – Treebeard Mini-Expansion
item.comment: WAR OF THE RING: LORDS OF MIDDLE EARTH- TREEBEARD MINI EXPANSION Like most promos, not necessary to play but cool to own. The Treebeard mini is sweet!

item.name: WarCraft: The Board Game
item.comment: WARCRAFT: THE BOARD GAME Nice version of the Warcraft computer game. I like it, but it's probably not detailed enough for wargamers.

item.name: WarCraft: The Board Game Expansion Set
item.comment: WARCRAFT: THE BOARD GAME EXPANSION SET Adds a little bit more to base game. Not bad.

item.name: Waterworks
item.comment: WATERWORKS I played this as a kid, and picked up an original set. I like the plastic bathtub card holder, and brass wrenches.

item.name: We Are Dead: Zombie Mall Massacre
item.comment: WE ARE DEAD: ZOMBIE MALL MASSACRE Generally I'm sick of all the zombie games.

item.name: Welcome to the Dungeon
item.comment: WELCOME TO THE DUNGEON Not really much of a game here.

item.name: The Werewolves of Miller's Hollow
item.comment: THE WEREWOLVES OF MILLER'S HOLLOW Not bad, but 'Ultimate Werewolf' gives you alot more for your money.

item.name: The Werewolves of Miller's Hollow: New Moon
item.comment:
NEW MOON: THE WEREWOLVES OF MILLER'S HOLLOW
Not bad, but 'Ultimate Werewolf' gives you a lot more for your money.

item.name: Win, Place & Show
item.comment: WIN, PLACE & SHOW Old, but fun once in a while. Can run long if you play six races.

item.name: Wits & Wagers
item.comment: WITS & WAGERS Good party game that can handle many players or teams. The dry erase markers included dry up fast. Get yourself a good set of markers.

item.name: Wits & Wagers Party
item.comment: WITS & WAGERS PARTY Good, but I prefer the betting system in the original game.

item.name: Wiz-War (eighth edition)
item.comment: WIZ-WAR Fantasy Flight has done another excellent job. Components are great, and the rules seem pretty basic. There may be times when you need to clarify certain spell rules though.

item.name: Wiz-War: Malefic Curses
item.comment: WIZ WAR:MALEFIC CURSES More stuff.

item.name: Wok Star
item.comment: WOK STAR The timer is fair, but the rest of the game is great.

item.name: Word on the Street
item.comment: WORD ON THE STREET Steer your family and friends toward this cool little word game the next time they want to play 'Scrabble' (ugh).

item.name: World of Warcraft Trading Card Game
item.comment: WORLD OF WARCRAFT THE TRADING CARD GAME Fun because it's so much unlike other CCGs.

item.name: Würfel Bohnanza
item.comment: WURFEL BOHNANZA A fun dice version of 'Bohnanza', but I like the card game just a bit better.

item.name: Yahtzee
item.comment: YAHTZEE Much better alternatives: 'Can't Stop' 'To Court the King' 'Liar's Dice' 'Last Chance' 'Sharp Shooters' Don't have any of these? THEN go ahead, play 'Yahtzee'!

item.name: Zombicide
item.comment: ZOMBICIDE Fun and exciting, but only with the right group.

item.name: Zombie Dice
item.comment: ZOMBIE DICE Simple Fun once in a while.

item.name: Zombie Dice 2: Double Feature
item.comment: ZOMBIE DICE 2: DOUBLE FEATURE The new dice make the game a bit more interesting.

item.name: Zombie Dice 3: School Bus
item.comment: ZOMBIE DICE 3: SCHOOL BUS Great big, yellow, D20 full of brains!

item.name: Zombies!!!
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! Fun once in a while.

item.name: Zombies!!! 2: Zombie Corps(e)
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! 2: ZOMBIE CORPS(E) Good expansion. Super zombies, infected, and military hardware. Oh yeah!

item.name: Zombies!!! 3.5: Not Dead Yet
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! 3.5: NOT DEAD YET A whole bunch of cards I probably could have done without.

item.name: Zombies!!! 3: Mall Walkers
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! 3: MALL WALKERS Dawn of the Dead!

item.name: Zombies!!! 4: The End...
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! 4: THE END I like the zombie dogs, but the rest about the "book of the dead" fell flat for me.

item.name: Zombies!!! 5: School's Out Forever
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! 5: SCHOOL'S OUT FOREVER Adds another helipad.

item.name: Zombies!!! 6: Six Feet Under
item.comment: ZOMBIES!!! 6: SIX FEET UNDER Sewer travel was a fun idea, and added something to the game other than just more cards.

item.name: Zooloretto
item.comment: ZOOLORETTO Good family game with a unique theme.

item.name: Zooloretto: Familiarisation Area
item.comment: ZOOLORETTO: FRAMILIARISATION AREA Like many promos, not necessary to play but cool to own.

item.name: Zooloretto: Rio Grande Games Expansion Pack #1
item.comment: ZOOLORETTO EXPANSION PACK 1 Very simple mini expansion that makes Zooloretto even more interesting.

item.name: Містеріум
item.comment: TAJEMNICZE DOMOSTWO AKA MYSTERIUM I really like this game in which the ghost of a murder victim is trying to tell the players who murdered him (a la Dixit-like dream cards). It's lots of fun especially with the right group, and Dixit veterans will love it.
